statements.select:
SELECT A.OID , A.Type , A.Name , A.BPolicyOID , A.CreateDt , A.CreateUs , A.TdmxOID , A.IsLatest , B.WorkingDay FROM T_DOBJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DCALENDAR B ON A.OID = B.OID WHERE A.DeleteDt IS NULL AND A.Type = #Type# AND A.IsLatest = 1
AND A.OID = #OID#
ORDER BY A.TdmxOID
statements.insert:
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CalendarDetailOID),0) + 1 AS CalendarDetailOID FROM T_DCALENDARDETAIL
INSERT INTO T_DCALENDARDETAIL ( CalendarDetailOID , CalendarOID , Year , Month , Day , Title , Contents , IsHoliday ) VALUES ( #CalendarDetailOID# , #CalendarOID# , #Year# , #Month# , #Day# , #Title# , #Contents# , #IsHoliday# )
statements.select:
SELECT * FROM T_DCALENDARDETAIL WHERE CalendarOID = #CalendarOID#
AND Year = #Year#
AND Month = #Month#
AND Day = #Day#
AND IsHoliday = #IsHoliday#
